effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 437,202 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 232,307.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +159 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 642,470 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Become the pinnacle of Gallagio service excellence and dole out Kaja'Cola Mega-Lite to injured allies 10 times over 4 sec, healing them for 1.1 million and increasing their Speed by 2,005 for 5 sec. The number of servings is increased by your Haste. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your harmful and helpful spells have a chance to weave a Thread of Fate between you and your target for 5 sec. Tethered allies gain 5,619 bonus primary while the Thread holds and enemies take 263,373 Cosmic Damage when the Thread breaks.

name: Fate Weaver

spells.description: Use: Perform a weaving ritual, spinning the webs of fate and fashioning them into a Fateweaved Weapon.

description: Barely legible words are inscribed on the handle. "The ritual site lies in Azj-Kahet overlooking the Salien Gutters, far North of Rak-Zakaz."
